title: Manchu expansion assisted by cannons and gunpowder

content.question: Which of the following factors contributed most to ManchuÂ expansion in Asia during the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries?

choices.label: The development of large trading companies
The military alliances with western European states
The use of cannons and gunpowder

content.answer: The use of cannons and gunpowder

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
